data.meanings: to do/make/act/work/operate/perform/construct/manufacture, practice a handcraft, be active, one who does.
data.sentence: The word تَعْمَلُونَ comes from the root ع م ل and is associated with the meanings: to do/make/act/work/operate/perform/construct/manufacture, practice a handcraft, be active, one who does.

data.meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.
data.sentence: The word فَقُلْ comes from the root ق و ل and is associated with the meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.

data.meanings: became/was clear/free of a thing, to quit it, become irresponsible for it, guiltless of it, remove oneself from a thing, kept far or aloof (e.g. from unclean things), state of freedom/immunity/security/safety.Convalescent/sound/healthy, cure/heal, recover/restore.Create/produce, former/fashioner.He compounded or made a compromise with him for their mutual separation.Mankind/creation/beings/things that are created.
data.sentence: The word بَرِيءٌ comes from the root ب ر ا and is associated with the meanings: became/was clear/free of a thing, to quit it, become irresponsible for it, guiltless of it, remove oneself from a thing, kept far or aloof (e.g. from unclean things), state of freedom/immunity/security/safety.Convalescent/sound/healthy, cure/heal, recover/restore.Create/produce, former/fashioner.He compounded or made a compromise with him for their mutual separation.Mankind/creation/beings/things that are created.

data.meanings: to rebel, disobey, oppose, resist, transgress.
data.sentence: The word عَصَوْكَ comes from the root ع ص ي and is associated with the meanings: to rebel, disobey, oppose, resist, transgress.
